name: Snake Ludo
description: In this game, you will have to roll down the dice, in order to move to different positions on the board, wherein on the journey to the destination, you will be pulled down by snakes and raised to a higher position by a ladder.  Snake Ludo Game is an engaging and exciting board game that will help you achieve your goals. Snake Ludo Game Announced with New Interface and 100-Player Game Intro: Snake Ludo Game, the popular board and dice game, is now available in a new interface that's simple and fast. The game is based on the popular board and dice game, Snake and Ladder, and features 100-player gameplay. Players can enjoy a quick, engaging game of strategy whileTIng to reach 100
